overview_of_class: We will discuss the design and analysis of randomized controlled trials (RCT), primarily with human subjects. Class meetings will consist of student led presentations of the assigned reading materials. Students will prepare summaries of selected in-depth topics on the design and analysis of RCT's. As a final project, each student will prepare their own statistically designed protocol for an investigation of an intervention of their choice.
name: First-Year Seminar
title: WCAS STAT 101-6-20 First-Year Seminar
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Freshmen and Sophomores

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: We will discuss the design and analysis of randomized controlled trials (RCT), primarily with human subjects. Class meetings will consist of student led presentations of the assigned reading materials. Students will prepare summaries of selected in-depth topics on the design and analysis of RCT's. As a final project, each student will prepare their own statistically designed protocol for an investigation of an intervention of their choice.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
Fundamentals of Clinical Trials 5th ed. 2015 Edition, Lawrence M. Friedman, Curt D. Furberg
ISBN-10: 3319185381
https://www.amazon.com/Fundamentals-Clinical-Trials-Lawrence-Friedman/dp/3319185381/ref=dp_ob_title_bk

It is really important that students order the 5th edition

subject: STAT
